forcingConstraint.description:
What: Aggregated historical emissions of non-CO2 anthropogenic reactive gases (SO2, NOx, NH3, CH4, CO, NMVOC, BC, OC) by region and RCP sector.
Why: To provide consistent trends over the last 2-3 decades using data from the same source for any given country
forcingConstraint.longName: Historical Anthropogenic Non-CO2 Reactive Gas Emissions
forcingConstraint.name: Historical Anthropogenic Reactive Gas Emissions

reference.abstract: Data for CMIP6 are being provided as part of on-going research efforts to improve historical emissions data. We first describe core datasets that we are committed to providing by Fall 2015 (October) for use by atmospheric chemistry models to produce historical concentration fields. Potential refinements to this data that may be possible by this time will be described separately. Priority for these will be set depending on community feedback.
reference.title: Historical Emissions For CMIP6 (v1.0)

url.description: Follow the link to the pdf
url.name: Historical Emissions for CMIP6 (v1.0)
